Sorry we can't load new articles right now because there's a limit to how many articles I'm allowed to request for free. 
Try it again in a few hours. 

In order to provide unlimited news I have to pay a monthly fee of 450$ which I can't afford because I offer this app for free. 

So if you want me to help to pay this fee in order to provide unlimited news think about supporting the app in the Settings menu.
Change the language of the news articles

Check it out in the menu on the left! 

(You can see your liked topics in the My Statistics menu point)
MY News: news YOU like in multiple languages
Yes I want to keep this app for free but as long as I offer it for free (unless i show ads which I don\'t want to) there are some limitations to its use.

I use a third party api to request the news. I can only show a preview of the content of a news article and not the entire text. Furthermore the amount of news I can request per day is limited. So if there are more users it is possible that this limit is reached and you can\'t load new articles anymore for a certain amount of time.

I would have to pay 450$ per month to get rid of those limitations which i can\'t afford. So I would be happy if you supported the app with a really small amount per month if you want to help me offer a full version of this app. (You can support it in the Settings menu)
Here you see one news article for every topic you liked.
The more questions you answer with yes the more articles are displayed.
By swiping NEWS ARTICLES we know which CATEGORIES you like.
By answering QUESTIONS we know which TOPICS you like.
Every day we adjust the news we show to you according to your preferred CATEGORIES and TOPICS.
In MY STATISTICS you can always check out the data we collected about you.
If you have any question just write to my private email account :)
Swipe right if you like an article
Swipe left if you dislike an article
Click on an article to read it
Swipe in any direction to start
